select count(*) as "count" from board where status = 'Y' AND SALE_YN= 'N'

FROM BOARD
JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (BOARD_NO = REF_BNO)
WHERE BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD.SALE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
